text:
## Full-Stack Web Application[](#full-stack-web-application "Permalink to this heading")

LlamaIndex can be integrated into a downstream full-stack web application. It can be used in a backend server (such as Flask), packaged into a Docker container, and/or directly used in a framework such as Streamlit.

We provide tutorials and resources to help you get started in this area.

Relevant Resources:

*   [Fullstack Application Guide](https://docs.llamaindex.ai/en/stable/end_to_end_tutorials/apps/fullstack_app_guide.html)
    
*   [Fullstack Application with Delphic](https://docs.llamaindex.ai/en/stable/end_to_end_tutorials/apps/fullstack_with_delphic.html)
    
*   [A Guide to Extracting Terms and Definitions](https://docs.llamaindex.ai/en/stable/end_to_end_tutorials/question_and_answer/terms_definitions_tutorial.html)
    
*   [LlamaIndex Starter Pack](https://github.com/logan-markewich/llama_index_starter_pack)
